00095         public List<string> MemberOf
00096         {
00097             get 
00098             {
00099                 List<string> Values = new List<string>();
00100                 PropertyValueCollection Collection = DirectoryEntry.Properties["memberof"];
00101                 foreach (object Item in Collection)
00102                 {
00103                     Values.Add((string)Item);
00104                 }
00105                 return Values;
00106             }
00107         }

00195         public void Save()
00196         {
00197             try
00198             {
00199                 _DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges();
00200             }
00201             catch { throw; }
00202         }
00203 
00209         public object GetValue(string Property)
00210         {
00211             try
00212             {
00213                 PropertyValueCollection Collection = DirectoryEntry.Properties[Property];
00214                 if (Collection != null)
00215                 {
00216                     return Collection.Value;
00217                 }
00218                 return null;
00219             }
00220             catch { throw; }
00221         }
00222 
00228         public void SetValue(string Property,object Value)
00229         {
00230             try
00231             {
00232                 PropertyValueCollection Collection = DirectoryEntry.Properties[Property];
00233                 if (Collection != null)
00234                 {
00235                     Collection.Value = Value;
00236                 }
00237             }
00238             catch { throw; }
00239         }
00240         #endregion
00241

00243         private DirectoryEntry _DirectoryEntry;

00247 
00248         public void Dispose()
00249         {
00250             if (_DirectoryEntry != null)
00251             {
00252                 _DirectoryEntry.Dispose();
00253                 _DirectoryEntry = null;
00254             }
